personal_statement_what_to_improve: Providers need to be certain that an applicants standard of English meets the requirements in terms of a very good level of competency. The personal statement is below the required standard in terms of punctuation and grammar.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Providers must ensure that applicants are experts in their subject and an achievement of a level 6 in GCSE Mathematics, taken only 18 months ago doesn't demonstrate that the applicant has expert knowledge in the subject. An expert applicant in the subject should be achieving very high level GCSE marks ie level 8, as the subject will need to be taught up to and including A level. We expect all applicants to be experts in the subject to teach year 7 to 13 inclusively.
